See also: jugendliche

German[edit]

German Wikipedia has an article on:
Jugendliche
Wikipedia de

Etymology[edit]

Substantivization of jugendlich (“youthful”).

Pronunciation[edit]

  • IPA(key): /ˈjuːɡəntlɪçə/
  • Audio
    		(file)
  • Hyphenation: Ju‧gend‧li‧che

Noun[edit]

Jugendliche f (genitive Jugendlicher, plural Jugendliche, male Jugendlicher)

  1. youth, teenager, adolescent (female) (up to 17–19 years of age)
